content: {"Name": "St. Mary's Outreach", "Entity_Id": 95, "Category": "Food Pantry", "Subcategory": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "Organization": "St. Mary", "More_Information": "Please use Steuben St. entrance.\r\nGuests can visit 1 time 2 if necessary. walk in, limited amount of people inside building, client choice", "Counties": ["Albany"], "Location": "Albany", "Address": "10 Lodge Street", "City": "Albany", "State": "NY", "Zip": "12207", "Phone": "(518) 462-4357", "Hours_of_Operation": "Tuesday and Friday 9-11:30am", "Cost": "", "Accepts": "", "Website": "https://www.hist-stmarys.org/outreach-food-pantry", "Coalition": 1, "CFAN": 0, "Latitude": "42.651857", "Longitude": "-73.752801", "Last_Updated": "07-18-2024", "icon": "marker-F42000", "collection_name": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "collection_category": "Food Pantry"}
